mapper.insert: insert into doll_ad (ad_id, pid, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, orderby, target, bgcolor, ad_code) values (#{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orderby,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{target,jdbcType=BIT}, #{bgcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update doll_ad set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, media_type = #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_name = #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_link = #{adLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_email = #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_phone = #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_count = #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, orderby = #{orderby,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, target = #{target,jdbcType=BIT}, bgcolor = #{bgcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ad_id, pid, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, orderby, target, bgcolor, ad_code from doll_ad where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ad_id, pid, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, orderby, target, bgcolor, ad_code from doll_ad
select * from doll_ad WHERE pid=2 limit 1

select doll_ad.ad_id ad_id, doll_ad.media_type, doll_ad.ad_name, doll_ad.ad_link, doll_ad.start_time, doll_ad.end_time, doll_ad.link_man, doll_ad.link_email, doll_ad.link_phone, doll_ad.click_count, doll_ad.enabled, doll_ad.orderby, doll_ad.target, doll_ad.bgcolor, doll_ad.ad_code, doll_ad_position.position_id adp_position_id, doll_ad_position.position_name adp_position_name, doll_ad_position.ad_width adp_ad_width, doll_ad_position.ad_height adp_ad_height, doll_ad_position.position_desc adp_position_desc, doll_ad_position.is_open adp_is_open, doll_ad_position.position_style adp_position_style from doll_ad,doll_ad_position where doll_ad.pid=doll_ad_position.position_id and doll_ad.pid=1 limit 1
